name: Sunny Day (skyfire222)
description:
This game was made for the 2020 GMTK game jam under the theme of "Out of Control".

Play as pilot desperately trying to stop a plane from plummeting out of the sky, by pushing buttons, turning wheels, and checking the altitude meter. 

If you wish to check the source code, the link for the Github repository is here:  https://github.com/skyfire222/GMTKGameJam2020.git
